skillTree.name: Barded Warhorse
skillTree.description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

skillTree.name: Hammer of Sigmar
skillTree.description: The Warrior Priest implores Sigmar to imbue him with a modicum of divine strength, and now his hammer glows bright with power!

skillTree.name: Shield of Faith
skillTree.description: The Warrior Priest’s faith manifests in the form of a shield as hard as castle-forged steel.

skillTree.name: Soulfire
skillTree.description: A battle prayer that bathes the Warrior Priest in white, holy fire sears Sigmar’s foes but leaves the supplicant unharmed.

skillTree.name: Righteous Fury
skillTree.description: Spitting words of hatred against Sigmar's enemies, the Warrior Priest riles himself into a righteous fury.

skillTree.name: Sigmar’s Ward
skillTree.description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Safeguard
skillTree.description: It is no easy task to bend or break the armour of this being.

skillTree.name: Impassioned
skillTree.description: There is nothing but utter belief. There is no reasoning with this one.

skillTree.name: Wild-Eyed
skillTree.description: "Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"

skillTree.name: Conviction
skillTree.description: Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.

skillTree.name: Soothsaying
skillTree.description: Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.

skillTree.name: Tenacity
skillTree.description: This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.

skillTree.name: Augury
skillTree.description: An omen, a sign - this being knows things and any who follow will share their glory.

skillTree.name: Inviolable
skillTree.description: Never to be broken or dishonoured - never to succumb to the foe.

skillTree.name: Fervour
skillTree.description: This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.

skillTree.name: Divine Power
skillTree.description: Such is the power of faith that blows seem to glance off this warrior even as they fail to parry.

skillTree.name: Immaculate Flesh
skillTree.description: This Warrior Priest denies the power of Chaos with such fiery abandon that his comrades are inspired to resist the flames of evil with equal fervor.

skillTree.name: Deny the Heretic
skillTree.description: Only the magic of Sigmar's chosen shall flourish here.

effects.description:
Enemy spell resistance: -3%
	(enemy armies in province)

Enemy spell resistance: -6%
	(enemy armies in province)

Enemy spell resistance: -10%
	(enemy armies in province)

skillTree.name: Heart of the Gryphon
skillTree.description: The prayers of the warrior priest selflessly fill those around him with Sigmar's light, blessing them with protection while occupying the priest's own attentions.

skillTree.name: Beacon of Courage
skillTree.description: The power and majesty of Sigmar pours forth from the Warrior Priest and causes charging enemies to second-guess their every move.

skillTree.name: Armour of Righteousness
skillTree.description: No, leave the pauldron. Sigmar is with me!

skillTree.name: Heed Not the Witch
skillTree.description: Let your hammer deliver justice to the foul.

skillTree.name: Glorious Abandon
skillTree.description: CHAAAARRRRRGGGEEE!

skillTree.name: Path of Penance
skillTree.description: As Sigmar bled, so must I, so must we all. Through pain we find the strength to bring death to those who would threaten the Empire.

skillTree.name: Tunnel Vision
skillTree.description: This one loses himself to bloodlust and becomes a blur of death on the battlefield.

skillTree.name: Organized
skillTree.description: The smiths have already completed their order, the workers are in position and the masons are ready to begin.

effects.description:
Construction time: -20% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Retinue: Valet
skillTree.description: My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +5%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +20%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.name: Inspirational
skillTree.description: We all must fight, no matter our station.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Great Orator
skillTree.description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!

skillTree.name: Retinue: Physician
skillTree.description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.name: Stimulate Growth
skillTree.description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.name: Damage Building
skillTree.description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Regal
backgroundSkills.description: A regal air? Let's see how long that lasts.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Noble
backgroundSkills.description: "The smallfolk should be thankful - without us, who would they work for?"

effects.description:
Construction time: -20% for all buildings
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.name: Imperious
backgroundSkills.description: Franz has put his trust in this man; pray he does not let him down!

backgroundSkills.name: Monster Tracker
backgroundSkills.description: "If it's got a scent and footprints, I'll find it. Also, it helps if it's absolutely huge and can be spotted a league away."

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

backgroundSkills.name: Monster Hunter
backgroundSkills.description: The thrill of the chase, the tremor as the quarry is cornered, the ecstasy of the kill. These are the things that matter.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Kill the Heretics!
backgroundSkills.description: Chaos is nothing against our iron will!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos and Norsca
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Burn the Undead!
backgroundSkills.description: Those corpses will burn and only ash will remain.

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Defender of Men
backgroundSkills.description: Walls can't dodge!

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% when under siege
	(all units in army)

Reload time reduction: +10% when under siege
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Basic Training
backgroundSkills.description: The training of even basic troops is important because all hands are needed in these dangerous times.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +1 for Wolf-Kin, Spearmen, Swordsmen, Free Company Militia, Halberdiers and Greatswords units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +1 for Wolf-Kin, Spearmen, Swordsmen, Free Company Militia, Halberdiers and Greatswords units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Imperial Calibration
backgroundSkills.description: They will not know what hit them!

effects.description:
Range: +10% for artillery units
	(all units in army)

Missile strength: +10% for artillery units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Knight Heritage
backgroundSkills.description: Knights of the Empire have strong bloodlines.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -10% for cavalry units
	(all units in army)
